message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to consider.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?
I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $13500. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $12500?
